aka: The Young Lady and the Holligan

cast.name: 弗拉基米尔·马雅可夫斯基 Vladimir Mayakovsky

writer.name: 弗拉基米尔·马雅可夫斯基 Vladimir Mayakovsky
亚米契斯 Edmondo De Amicis

director.name: 弗拉基米尔·马雅可夫斯基 Vladimir Mayakovsky

trans_title: The Young Lady and the Holligan
introduction: A young woman arrives in her school where she must teach for the first time. Her task consists in teaching a class of adults to read and write. All her students are male, ranging from boys to old men, and they are rather rowdy and difficult. All the more as a young hooligan dares write her on a test paper that he loves her. Feeling harassed by the young man, she is defended by other students. But she more or less feels the young bad boy's love is true and when this one is lying on his dying bed, after being stabbed by the other students, she solaces him by kissing him tenderly.
